quotes.quote: I did this all by myself with React and TypeScript.
quotes.author: Robin Leber

quotes.quote: Passwords are like underwear: you don’t let people see it, you should change it very often, and you shouldn’t share it with strangers
quotes.author: Chris Pirillo

quotes.quote: If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Love the life you live. Live the life you love.
quotes.author: Bob Marley
